answers.answer: lol praying :)
Am praying:):)
Omg!! Are they sending you to l&d???
Praying!! Keep us updated
Nope! She said go home n bounce on my ball n walk walk walk and go to labor n delivary wen i get contractions!!
Omg how cutee!!. Good Luck!!. My two boys were over 8lbs & They were healthy. May god bless U and ur bby on da way :-D
You're so close! :D at 100% effaced you should be dilating soon after you get more contractions!
Thank you!! :)
I sure hope soo!! :)
Oh know..... I dont feel good at all.  I just tried to stand up to go pee got really really faint n threw up everywhere n my stomach is hurting really bad but no contractions! :( what is goin on
I had my son at 36w and for two or three days prior I was vomiting and having loose stool an felt like crap. Then the ctrx started and the vomiting got worse an my water broke.
Those ultrasounds can be wrong! 2 days before I had my little boy they estimated him to be 4lbs and when I had him he was almost 5! Good luck tho it sounds like yu will have a baby very soon

It can definitely be wrong, my SIL's baby was supposed to be over 8 and she ended up being under 7, my son was supposed to be about 7 and was almost 9, it can be off up to 2lbs. 8lbs is actually a pretty average sized baby, you can do it!!
Yep. Aidyn was supposed to be 5lbs 10oz an he was 6lbs 12oz.

Yeah, ultrasounds are just an estimate. My son was supposed to be 7+lbs and he was 5lbs5.6oz.Sex or masturbation could get those contractions going. Orgasm causes my uterus to tense but with you being effaced and dialated so far, semen isn't necessary.Good luck! :)
Good luck momma

Any suggestions of what you think helped with effacing and dialation? I am 33 weeks and i need to have a medically necessary reason to have my csection before feb 18th and i was told to maybe try inducing my own labor
Dcat, why are you trying to make a "medically necessary reason" to go into preterm labor? If you have a medically necessary reason to deliver early wouldn't you be? Sounds very dangerous.....:(
Awee!! So cute goodluck :)

I agree with stefani! I just had my boy at 35 weeks on Saturday and hes still in the nicu n may be there a while! Yu wanna keep that baby in as long as possible its definitely not fun seeing yer baby in the hospital and knowing yu can take them home

No, not preterm labor. I am looking for something that is effective. To help thin my cervix or dialation for my 38-39th week. Im not looking to go into labor but if at my 38 week appntment my cervix shows significant dialation or effacement than my ob can schedule my csection for before the 18th.  Just thinking about working on inducing my own labor (not now) but in a few weeks so my ob has a medically necessary reason to over ride my csection date.
Oh my goodness!!! Thats awesome :) soon enough!

Is there a specific reason you need to deliver before the 18th tho? It's best to keep that baby in as long as possible! I have to be induced tomorrow due to preeclampsia and I will be 37w 6d and as tired and as much pain as I'm in I know it would be better if I wasn't sick and could wait another week or so. But since I am sick and have a medical emergency that requires my baby boy to be born now my doctor is inducing me.

@Stephanie, my original csection date was supposed to be feb 15th. Which is a friday. My husband doesnt get paid time off and i cant financially afford for him to take monday(the 18th) thru the 21st off work to be with me in the hospital. I have a 5 year d as well that will be with me as well. I need to have a reason to have my surgery on a thu or friday so my husband only takes off one day and then has the whole weekend off to help me while i am in recovery. Its all very technical. The 15th is a friday, but doc has board meetings all that day, the 14th is thu which i dont mind it being valentines day but ill be 38 weeks and 6 days and they cant scehdule a csection until exactly 39 weeks. So if i can do something that makes it legally okay for her to do my csection on thursday she will.

question: So im almost 37 weeks pregnant.! Im dialated to a 3! Im 100% effaced!! N my little guy ant so little! I knew he was big because thats y im gettn induced but i had an ultrasound n hes a little over 8 pounds!!!! Oh i pray he comes soon!!! Pray for me ladies!!!
title: WOW!!! Doctor update!!!
